hanzi-su-wiki:
吸

Значения

Вдыхать, втягивать, всасывать

Мнемоника

  • Достигать 及 ртом 口 — поглощать, всасывать, курить.

  • "Я вдыхаю сигаретный дым."
purpleculture_pinyin:
xī
to breathe; to suck in; to absorb; to inhale
дышать; всасывать; Абсорбировать; вдыхать
rtega_mnemonic:
吸吸RSinhale, suck in, absorb, attract
  • air reaches 及 the lungs through the mouth 口 by inhalation; person bringing his hand 及 with cigarette to his mouth 口 ready to inhale
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 呼
Pictophonetic: 及 indicates the sound; 口 (mouth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
吸引 [ xī yǐn ]: to attract (interest, investment etc); Classifiers: 个
吸收 [ xī shōu ]: to absorb; to assimilate; to ingest; to recruit
呼吸 [ hū xī ]: to breathe
吸引力 [ xī yǐn lì ]: attractive force (such as gravitation); sex appeal; attractiveness
吸取 [ xī qǔ ]: to absorb; to draw (a lesson, insight etc); to assimilate
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 及 [ jí ] to extend; to reach; and; in time
heisig_chinese_memo: You try to catch up with your skinny friend but lose your breath and now it's hard to inhale so you have to use your nose and mouth at the same time to suck in air. &nbsp
heisig_story: Mouth . . . outstretched hands. Hint: use the image of a nursing baby.
koohiiStory1: Imagine a baby reaching out and holding mom´s breast as if it were bottle, and sucking on it to get some milk.
koohiiStory2: An open mouth and reaching hands : a baby wants to suck at his mother´s breast.
jp_example_words:
吸収(きゅうしゅう): absorption, suction, attraction
呼吸(こきゅう): breath, respiration, knack, trick, secret (of doing something)
吸う(すう): to smoke, breathe in, sip, suck
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your mouth is like an escalator you use to suck and inhale things into your body.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: If you're ever having trouble remembering how to suck or inhale, just picture an actual escalator that leads into your mouth. That'll definitely help.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Use this mouth ability to suck cucumbers (きゅう) into your mouth. Cucumbers are shaped like cylinders so you can suck them into your mouth like this. Just as nature intended.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You can inhale a cucumber too, I suppose, but don't tell anyone I told you to.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a mouth (口) amounts to (及) a sucking device
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You try to catch up with your skinny friend but lose your breath and now it's hard to inhale so you have to use your nose and mouth at the same time to suck in air. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " mouth ", " and " sound, the original meaning is to inhale into the inside. "Shuowen": "Inner interest. From the mouth, and the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Inner interest, accept its interest." "Zhengzitong‧ Mouth": "Inhale into the air." "Zhuangzi‧ "Xiaoyaoyou": "Inhale the wind and drink the dew." Jia Yi of the Han Dynasty (Xue Xie): "Dan but happy, inhale the air and soar."

" Suck " can mean drinking and smoking. For example, "Songs of the Chu‧ Nine Chapters‧ Yuanyou": "Sucks the tiny liquid of the flying spring, Huaying of Huaying Wanyan." Tang Dynasty Hanshan "Poetry" 107: "At this time, I suck two cups and recite 500 poems." Song Dynasty Lu You's "Drunk Song": "When I smoked, the country fell into my chest."

" Suction " can also mean absorption. For example, Han Yangxiong's "Tai Xuan-Xuan Tu": "Evil Mo sucks high, which is to tame gods." Fan Wang's note: "Suck, get also." Three Kingdoms Wei Jikang <Qin Fu>: "It contains the mellowness of heaven and earth, and absorbs the rest of the sun and the moon."

" Suction " can also mean attraction. "Yu Pian‧ Mouth": "Attract, introduce." Wang Fuzhi of the Qing Dynasty, "Jiang Zhai Poetry Notes: Appendix": "It has truncated head and shrunk feet, and is skillful in removing attraction. It is also necessary to ask for the tone of the sentence. There is no such thing as Ligu." Modern Chinese words such as "magnetite" and "siphon phenomenon" all use this meaning.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " mouth ", " and " sound, the original meaning is to breathe in.
humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「及」聲，本義為吸氣入內。《說文》：「內息也。从口，及聲。」段玉裁注：「內息，納其息也。」《正字通‧口部》：「氣入為吸。」《莊子‧逍遙遊》：「吸風飲露。」漢代賈誼〈惜誓〉：「澹然而自樂兮，吸眾氣而翱翔。」

　　「吸」可表示飲用、吸食。如《楚辭‧九章‧遠游》：「吸飛泉之微液兮，懷琬琰之華英。」唐代寒山《詩》107：「此時吸兩甌，吟詩五百首。」宋代陸游〈醉歌〉：「方我吸酒時，江山入胸中。」

　　「吸」也可表示吸取，如漢揚雄《太玄‧玄圖》：「邪謨高吸，乃馴神靈。」范望注：「吸，取也。」三國魏嵇康〈琴賦〉：「含天地之醇和兮，吸日月之休光。」

　　「吸」還可表示吸引。《玉篇‧口部》：「吸，引也。」清代王夫之《薑齋詩話‧附錄》：「其有截頭縮腳，以善巧脫卸吸引為工，要亦就文句上求語氣，於理固無多也。」現代漢語「吸鐵石」、「虹吸現象」等詞彙皆用此義。
humanum_short_description: 從「口」，「及」聲，本義為吸氣入內。

從「 口 」，「 及 」聲，本義為吸氣入內。《說文》：「內息也。从口，及聲。」段玉裁注：「內息，納其息也。」《正字通‧口部》：「氣入為吸。」《莊子‧逍遙遊》：「吸風飲露。」漢代賈誼〈惜誓〉：「澹然而自樂兮，吸眾氣而翱翔。」 「 吸 」可表示飲用、吸食。如《楚辭‧九章‧遠游》：「吸飛泉之微液兮，懷琬琰之華英。」唐代寒山《詩》107：「此時吸兩甌，吟詩五百首。」宋代陸游〈醉歌〉：「方我吸酒時，江山入胸中。」 「 吸 」也可表示吸取，如漢揚雄《太玄‧玄圖》：「邪謨高吸，乃馴神靈。」范望注：「吸，取也。」三國魏嵇康〈琴賦〉：「含天地之醇和兮，吸日月之休光。」 「 吸 」還可表示吸引。《玉篇‧口部》：「吸，引也。」清代王夫之《薑齋詩話‧附錄》：「其有截頭縮腳，以善巧脫卸吸引為工，要亦就文句上求語氣，於理固無多也。」現代漢語「吸鐵石」、「虹吸現象」等詞彙皆用此義。
From the " mouth", " and" sound, the original meaning is to inhale into the inside. "Shuowen": "Inner interest. From the mouth, and the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Inner interest, accept its interest." "Zhengzitong‧ Mouth": "Inhale into the air." "Zhuangzi‧ "Xiaoyaoyou": "Inhale the wind and drink the dew." Jia Yi of the Han Dynasty (Xue Xie): "Dan but happy, inhale the air and soar." " Suck" can mean drinking and smoking. For example, "Songs of the Chu‧ Nine Chapters‧ Yuanyou": "Sucks the tiny liquid of the flying spring, Huaying of Huaying Wanyan." Tang Dynasty Hanshan "Poetry" 107: "At this time, I suck two cups and recite 500 poems." Song Dynasty Lu You's "Drunk Song": "When I smoked, the country fell into my chest." " Suction" can also mean absorption. For example, Han Yangxiong's "Tai Xuan-Xuan Tu": "Evil Mo sucks high, which is to tame gods." Fan Wang's note: "Suck, get also." Three Kingdoms Wei Jikang : "It contains the mellowness of heaven and earth, and absorbs the rest of the sun and the moon." " Suction" can also mean attraction. "Yu Pian‧ Mouth": "Attract, introduce." Wang Fuzhi of the Qing Dynasty, "Jiang Zhai Poetry Notes: Appendix": "It has truncated head and shrunk feet, and is skillful in removing attraction. It is also necessary to ask for the tone of the sentence. There is no such thing as Ligu." Modern Chinese words such as "magnetite" and "siphon phenomenon" all use this meaning.

吸字的基本解释

吸
xī
从口或鼻把气引入体内：呼吸。吸气。吸烟。
引取：吸引。吸附。
呼

吸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》許及切，入緝，曉。］
(1)引气入体内。与“呼”相对。
(2)吸饮；吸食。
(3)吸取；摄取。
(4)吹奏。
(5)引；吸引。
(6)吸收。参见“吸墨紙”。
(7)见“吸呷”。
(8)象声词。形容笑声。
(9)通“翕”。收缩，收敛。
(10)通“翕”。聚合。参见“吸逮”、“吸聚”。
(11)通“翕”。亲近。参见“吸習”。
(12)通“翕”。动貌。参见“吸吸”。

吸字的英文翻译

◎ 吸
absorb, attract, inhale, suck, suction, whiff

吸字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　吸； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页179第12
【廣韻】【正韻】許及切【集韻】【韻會】迄及切，?音翕。【說文】內息也。从口及聲。【玉篇】吸，引也。【正字通】氣出爲吹，氣入爲息。【楚辭·九章】吸湛露之浮涼。　又【司馬相如·上林賦】瀏莅芔吸。【註】皆林木鼔動之聲。　又人名。【史記·高祖紀】令將軍王吸屯武關。又【田橫傳】使灌嬰破殺齊將田吸于千乗。　又【廣韻】同翕。【玉篇】引《詩·小雅》：載吸其舌。按今《詩》作翕。箋，猶引也。　又吸吸。【劉向·九歎】雲吸吸以湫戾。　又【六書故】俗謂飮曰吸。

吸字的源字形

吸字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Suck
xī
Introduce qi into the body from the mouth or nose: breathing. Inhale. Smoking.
Quote: Attract. Adsorption.
call
Suck
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Xu Jiqi, enter the arrest, Xiao. ]
(1) Entrain the air into the body. Contrast with "hu".
(2) snorting; snorting.
(3) Absorb; ingest.
(4) Playing.
(5) Lead; attract.
(6) Absorption. See "Blotting Paper".
(7) See "Sucking".
(8) Onomatopoeia. Describe laughter.
(9) Link "Ji". Shrink, converge.
(10) Link "Ji". polymerization. See "sucking up", "sucking up".
(11) Link "Ji". Get close. See "absorption".
(12) Link "Ji". Dynamic appearance. See "Suction".
Suck

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Moral Department] 　吸; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: Page 179-12
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Xu Jiqi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Until now,? Yin Ji. 【Said the text】Internal interest also. Speak up. 【Jade articles】Suck, cite. [Zhengzi Tong] Breathing out is blowing, and breathing in is breathing. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Chapters] The coolness of sucking Zhan Lu.　[Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu] Liu Li Fei Su. [Note] The sound of all forest trees moving.　Another name. [Historical Records · Gao Zu Ji] Let the general king suck at Wuguan. Also [Tian Hengchuan] makes Guan Ying break and kill Qi and suck Tian to Qiancheng.　[Guangyun] Tongji. [Jade articles] Quote from "Poetry Xiaoya": Carry and suck his tongue. According to today's "Poetry" as Ji. Jian, still cited.　Suck again. [Liu Xiang·Jiu Sigh] The cloud sucks in order to 湫戾.　Also [The Six Books] The common saying is that it is to suck.
Suck

形声字。口表意,其形像口(嘴),表示从口吸人;及(ji)表声,及有到达义,表示把气体或液体吸到体内。本义是向体
内纳气。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Рот выражает смысл, его форма подобна рту (рту), что означает вдыхание людей изо рта; и (дзи) выражает звук и имеет широкое значение, что означает вдыхание газа или жидкости в тело.
Первоначальное значение - получить ци в тело.
① Введите жидкость, газ и т. Д. В тело изо рта или ноздри: ~ ци | ~ дым | выдох ~.
2 Поглощение: ~ Пот | ~ Пыль.
③Привлечение: ~ приложенная | ~ сила.
~ Poison ~ Slip ~ Take ~ Hot ~ Sound ~ Food ~ Close
~ Сосание ~ Иньконг ~ Сосание ~ Ха ~ Связанная костная ткань ~ Костный мозг
Сосать
какие.
Сосать
| Сосать

писец
файлы
xī
гл.
1) вдыхать, втягивать; затягиваться (напр. дымом), курить; всасывать, впитывать, поглощать
吸一口新鲜空气 вдохнуть глоток свежего воздуха
呼吸 выдох и вдох
长虫吸蛤蟆 змея проглотила лягушку
2) притягивать; привлекать; втягивать, вовлекать; увлекать, отвлекать
吸了不少人去 увлёк немало людей
3) пить
吸湛露之浮凉 пить прохладу обильной росы
4) вм. 扱 (брать; собирать; снимать)

吸

Значения

Вдыхать, втягивать, всасывать

Мнемоника

  • Достигать 及 ртом 口 — поглощать, всасывать, курить.

  • "Я вдыхаю сигаретный дым."
Radicals: 口, 及  (mouth, escalator)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your mouth is like an escalator you use to suck and inhale things into your body.
If you're ever having trouble remembering how to suck or inhale, just picture an actual escalator that leads into your mouth. That'll definitely help.
Reading Mnemonic
Use this mouth ability to suck cucumbers (きゅう) into your mouth. Cucumbers are shaped like cylinders so you can suck them into your mouth like this. Just as nature intended.
You can inhale a cucumber too, I suppose, but don't tell anyone I told you to.
